result.title: New industrial value chains impact report, and journal article.
result.description: New industrial value chains impact report and journal articleThe impact of the new industrial value chains created in WP4 is evaluated A monitoring procedure will be developed and effective engagement established in conjunction with Task 44 to collect both direct and indirect impacts of each VIDA funded projects in terms of new innovationvalue chains created and also income and employment opportunities created Data will be extrapolated to show the overall impacts expected postproject over a 5 and 10 year horizon The wider expected impact of these activities on different sectors will also be qualitatively evaluated Responding to our evaluation procedures will be a condition of receiving funding from VIDA

result.title: Analytical model on TE and TD effects
result.description: A simplified analytical model on TE and MTE phenomena that can be compared directly to the experimental findings will be proposed The internal Seebeck field of ferrofluids due to thermodiffusion will be calculated and optimized by varying physical parameters such as MNPs concentration magnetic moments and sizes as well as the external magnetic field The theoretical model will then be extended beyond the standard linear response theory approximation to describe the realistic experimental situation
